data.actual_result: The text is outside of the tooltip and behind the scrollbar. Also trying to change the limit will crash Discord
data.expected_result: The string No limit translated (Κανένα Όριο) should be "inside" the tooltip
data.short_description: While using Greek as Discord's language the string in VC settings is not inside the user limit tooltip
data.steps_to_repro: - Set Discord's language to Greek - Click the cog next to a voice channel to access the channel's settings - While in the Overview tab hover the cursor over the User limit scroll bar while it is on the far left (unlimited users)
